properties.name: spring.alexa.applicationId
properties.description: The application id that alexa(dev) provides amzn1.ask.skill.xxxxxxx

properties.name: spring.alexa.cardTitle
properties.description: card title that you want to go on the account alexa.amazon and in the appstore

properties.name: spring.alexa.response.repromptHelpIntent
properties.defaultValue: I'm sorry I didn't understand that. Could you please repeat Or you can say help to learn the valid actions

properties.name: spring.alexa.response.repromptGenericIntent
properties.defaultValue: Would you like me to help with anything else ? If not you can say good bye
